#!/bin/bash

# beads-bridge: Automatically prime beads context or suggest initialization
# Part of superpowers skill integration

# Check if beads CLI is available
if ! command -v bd &> /dev/null; then
    # bd not installed - silent exit (user may not want beads)
    exit 0
fi

# Check if this project has beads initialized
if [ -d ".beads" ]; then
    # Beads is active - run prime to inject workflow context
    bd prime 2>/dev/null || exit 0
else
    # Beads CLI available but project not initialized
    echo "[Beads Available] This project doesn't use beads yet."
    echo ""
    echo "Beads provides persistent task tracking for long-horizon development."
    echo "To enable: bd init"
    echo "To enable (stealth mode, no git commits): bd init --stealth"
    echo ""
    echo "Once enabled, superpowers skills will automatically use beads for:"
    echo "  - plan-to-epic: Convert plans to tracked epics"
    echo "  - epic-executor: Execute with persistent state"
    echo ""
    echo "Learn more: https://github.com/steveyegge/beads"
fi
